title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1beta1\Registration
name: Registration
description:
The Registration resource facilitates managing and configuring domain name registrations.

There are several ways to create a new Registration resource: To create a new Registration resource, find a suitable domain name by calling the SearchDomains method with a query to see available domain name options. After choosing a name, call RetrieveRegisterParameters to ensure availability and obtain information like pricing, which is needed to build a call to RegisterDomain. Another way to create a new Registration is to transfer an existing domain from another registrar. First, go to the current registrar to unlock the domain for transfer and retrieve the domain's transfer authorization code. Then call RetrieveTransferParameters to confirm that the domain is unlocked and to get values needed to build a call to TransferDomain.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1beta1.Registration

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. Name of the Registration resource, in the format projects/*/locations/*/registrations/<domain_name>.

params.name: data.domain_name
params.description: Required. Immutable. The domain name. Unicode domain names must be expressed in Punycode format.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The creation timestamp of the Registration resource.

params.name: data.expire_time
params.description: Output only. The expiration timestamp of the Registration.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. The state of the Registration

params.name: data.issues
params.description: Output only. The set of issues with the Registration that require attention.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Set of labels associated with the Registration.

params.name: data.management_settings
params.description: Settings for management of the Registration, including renewal, billing, and transfer. You cannot update these with the UpdateRegistration method. To update these settings, use the ConfigureManagementSettings method.

params.name: data.dns_settings
params.description: Settings controlling the DNS configuration of the Registration. You cannot update these with the UpdateRegistration method. To update these settings, use the ConfigureDnsSettings method.

params.name: data.contact_settings
params.description: Required. Settings for contact information linked to the Registration. You cannot update these with the UpdateRegistration method. To update these settings, use the ConfigureContactSettings method.

params.name: data.pending_contact_settings
params.description: Output only. Pending contact settings for the Registration. Updates to the contact_settings field that change its registrant_contact or privacy fields require email confirmation by the registrant_contact before taking effect. This field is set only if there are pending updates to the contact_settings that have not been confirmed. To confirm the changes, the registrant_contact must follow the instructions in the email they receive.

params.name: data.supported_privacy
params.description: Output only. Set of options for the contact_settings.privacy field that this Registration supports.
